review: I love it! I'm watching it now.
author: BB2Tutor "Barbara  B 2Tutor"

review: Amazing device with a good internal storage space, much faster than Roku
author: Jai Prakash

review: I'm an older lady, so I needed my younger, tech capable son to install it. Also, the remote is small, with fine print writing, and no writing on the circle, so that took some major adjustment to use. Other than that, it is great!
author: May

review: Very pleased with the fire stick.  The advantage over the Roku stick is that it can be put to sleep and has an app for sling box.  The sling box app is a little awkward to use, but is better than needing a computer tied to the tv.
author: Mike S

review: THIS WAS SO EASY TO SET UP AND USE.  LOVE IT!
author: Debbie Owen

review: I love my Fire Stick, I can enjoy programs and movies from Prime on the big screen.
author: Jan Keene

review: Enjoy my fire stick gives me a great selection to choice from.
author: Leora Blue

review: Works great. I would highly recommend this
author: Shrek

review: I like this much better than the "Chromecast" device!
author: David L. Carroll
